div.p: ONLINE USER 1: I never paid attention to the ads, but, seeing all those ads together made me really wanna have a drink.
ONLINE USER 2: Yeah I wish some of that stuff happened in my life. They make it look pretty good!
ONLINE USER 3: Imagine what the ads would look like if it was the shy introverts who made more high-risk choices than the rest of us.
ONLINE USER 4: I don't know, I guess you'd see a lot more ads for people drinking at book clubs or something.
